front.div:
a b s t r a c t
We have reported a modified V-shaped external cavity, which is constructed around a commercial diode
laser operating at a center wavelength of l¼785 nm by adding a new coated glass plate with about 50%
reflectivity to the cavity. This allows simultaneous dual-wavelengths operation in the vicinity of
Dn min ¼0.18 THz to Dn max ¼ 0.22 THz, which can be used as laser source for terahertz generation either
for semiconductor devices or nonlinear schemes.
